trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일 내 관련된 섹션의 그룹을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일 (예: Web.config 파일)의 설정 섹션으로 구성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group.
trans-unit.target: 일부 섹션 관련 되어 있기 때문에 섹션 그룹에서 그룹화 하려면 편리한 경우가 많습니다.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroup class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationSectionGroup 클래스 나타냅니다는 `sectionGroup` 에서 정의 될 때 그룹 섹션에 사용 되는 XML 요소는 `configSections` 구성 파일의 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections).
trans-unit.target: 섹션 그룹을 중첩 될 수 있습니다 (섹션 그룹 섹션은 물론 다른 섹션 그룹에 포함할 수 있음).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into ConfigurationSectionGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 `configSections` 세 개의 중첩 된 섹션 그룹을 정의 하는 요소: ``` <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.extensions"...> <sectionGroup name="scripting" ...> <section name="scriptResourceHandler".../> <sectionGroup name="webServices"...> <section name="jsonSerialization" .../> <section name="profileService" ... /> <section name="authenticationService" .../> <section name="roleService" .../> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </sectionGroup> </configSections> ``` 구성 시스템 ConfigurationSectionGroup 개체로 구성 파일에서 설정을 로드 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a ConfigurationSectionGroup object.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>및 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>섹션 및 ConfigurationSectionGroup 개체에 포함 된 섹션 그룹에 액세스 하는 속성.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일에서 정보에 액세스 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>클래스</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이를 강제로 선언 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: ForceDeclaration 메서드 강제로 수는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>부모 파일에 이미 선언 되어 필요 하지 않은 경우에 구성 파일에 쓸 개체입니다.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Forces the declaration for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이를 강제로 선언 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A> method forces this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>메서드는이 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>선언 하는 경우 파일에 쓰여지도록 `force` 은 `true`.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.ForceDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object is required by the system.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `force` 은 `false`, 하는 경우이 작업을 무시 될 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>개체 시스템에 필요한.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The ForceDeclaration method can force a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file.
trans-unit.target: ForceDeclaration 메서드 강제로 수는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>부모 파일에 이미 선언 되어 필요 하지 않은 경우에 구성 파일에 쓸 개체입니다.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required.
trans-unit.target: 또한 그룹 필요 하지 않은 경우 구성 파일에서 그룹을 제거할 수 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: You might want to use the ForceDeclaration method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists.
trans-unit.target: 구성 파일을 보다 쉽게 이동 하려면 한 컴퓨터에서 다른 그룹 선언이 이미 존재 하는지 여부에 관계 없이 ForceDeclaration 메서드를 사용 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object must be written to the file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 고, 그렇지 않으면 파일에 작성 된 개체가 있어야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object declaration is required.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부이 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체 선언이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> declaration is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 경우 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 선언 되 고, 그러지 않으면 필요한 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object is declared.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부이 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체를 선언 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the IsDeclared property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: IsDeclared 속성이 반환 하는 섹션 그룹 구성 파일에 선언 된 경우 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsDeclared property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 속성은 IsDeclared 반환 `false` 이 섹션은 Machine.config 또는 부모 구성 파일에서 상속 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> is declared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 경우 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 선언 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 이름 속성을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Name property value is the name of the section group that does not contain the parent section groups.
trans-unit.target: Name 속성 값은 부모 섹션 그룹을 포함 하지 않는 섹션 그룹의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name property of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이의 name 속성 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the section group name associated with this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 관련 섹션 그룹 이름을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SectionGroupName property value is the full path name of the section group, including the parent section groups..
trans-unit.target: SectionGroupName 속성 값은 부모 섹션 그룹을 포함 하 여 섹션 그룹의 전체 경로 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The section group name of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 섹션 그룹 이름을 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> 모두 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체의 자식 요소인 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects that are children of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> 모두 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체의 자식 요소인 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> 모두 포함 하는 개체 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> 이 내의 개체 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object that contains all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects within this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> 모두 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> 이 내의 개체 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 여부 현재 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 구성 개체 계층의 지정 된 대상 버전에 대 한 serialize 될 때 인스턴스를 serialize 해야는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 각 구성 섹션 그룹에 대해 만들어진는 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 명시적으로이 메서드를 재정의 하 고 반환 해야 이상 버전 및 `true`, 섹션 그룹의 지정된 된 버전에 대 한 유효한 경우에는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 이전 버전의에 대해 생성 된 기존 구성 섹션 그룹은 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 변경 될 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 기본 형식 항상 반환 하는이 메서드의 기본 구현을 포함 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 구성 섹션 그룹 구현 자가이 메서드를 재정의 하지 않는 경우 기본적으로 구성 섹션 그룹은 직렬화 모든 프레임 워크 버전에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 대상 버전의는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>현재 섹션 그룹을 serialize 해야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 종류를 가져오거나 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class is a derived type, the Type property will return the name of the derived type that extends the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: 경우이 인스턴스 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>클래스는 파생된 유형, Type 속성이 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>클래스</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> 를 확장 하는 파생 된 형식 이름을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The type of this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 유형의 <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The section or group is already defined at another level.
trans-unit.target: 섹션 또는 그룹은 이미 다른 수준에서 정의 됩니다.
